Rooms.Name: Start of Aldin, City of the Dwarves
Entrance to Aldin, City of the Dwarves
At a dead end in the mines.
At the end of the tunnel

Objects.Name: map aldin
Objects.Description: A map of Aldin and the Dwarven Trade Route.

Objects.Name: headstone head stone
Objects.Description: A headstone has been set in the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Your everyday typical headstone, made from black granite, and engraved with _____________|             \|    R I P    ||             ||             ||             ||             ||             ||_____________|Obviously there's plenty of room for your name on it.It's also extremely heavy...

Objects.Name: onyx necklace
Objects.Description: Someone has left a small onyx necklace here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The necklace has been made with small stones of onyx, all connected by a thinsilver chain.  You think it would fit you just perfectly.  A small rune has beenscribed on one of the pieces.  It looks like a 'W'

Objects.Name: ankh bloodstone
Objects.Description: A 2" ankh made from bloodstone has been dropped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It looks a bit like this 0-+- | |and it's made from bloodstone.

Objects.Name: amethyst pendant
Objects.Description: A pendant made from amethyst is here on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: It's very good craftmanship.  Obviously dwarven manufacture.

Objects.Name: axe dwarven
Objects.Description: An axe, obviously of dwarven manufacture, has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A nicely made battle axe, with the rune 'T' engraved on the haft.

Objects.Name: short sword shortsword dwarven
Objects.Description: A short sword with a broad blade has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: This sword is typical dwarven manufacture.  The forge in the mountain hasproduced planty of these small wonders to start a full-scale war.  Thisparticular blade bears a small 'T' rune, near the handle.

Objects.Name: dagger dwarven
Objects.Description: A large dagger, almost resembling a small sword, is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A standard dwarven dagger, made in the forges of the dwarven mountain.  Ithas a small 'T' rune engraved near the handle.

Objects.Name: plate mail platemail dwarven
Objects.Description: A platemail, obviously of crafted by dwarves, has been left here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A fine platemail, marked with an 'R' rune on the backside.

Objects.Name: ring mail ringmail dwarven
Objects.Description: A ringmail has been thrown in a heap here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A mail shirt, made from small interlocking rings, it has taken quite sometime to make.  On the inside of the collar is a small 'R' rune.

Objects.Name: bracers steel dwarven
Objects.Description: Some bracers made of the finest steel are here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Some fine steel bracers, all polished and shiny.  On the inside, near theelbows, a small 'R' rune has been set.

Objects.Name: gloves dwarven
Objects.Description: Some gloves have been thrown here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A fine set of gloves.  They appear to be made from buckskin at first, but acloser examination reveals in inner glove made from small rings of the highlypraised dwarven metal, mithril.  This makes the glove very strong, and suchgloves are known to be enchanted.

Objects.Name: iron ore
Objects.Description: Some iron ore has been piled up here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A pretty much nondescript pile of rustred ore, ready to be refined.

Objects.Name: ore gold
Objects.Description: Some gold ore has been piled up here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A pretty nondescript pile of gold-streaked ore.

Objects.Name: ore titanium
Objects.Description: Some titanium ore has been piled up here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A pretty nondescript pile of titanium-gray ore.

Objects.Name: rod iron
Objects.Description: A small rod, made from iron, is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A small rod, made for comfotably moving small amounts of metal.  In this caseiron.

Objects.Name: rod gold
Objects.Description: A small rod, made of gold, is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A small rod, made for comfotably moving small amounts of metal.  In this casegold.

Objects.Name: rod titanium
Objects.Description: A small rod, made of titanium, is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A small rod, made for comfotably moving small amounts of metal.  In this casetitanium.

Objects.Name: bar iron
Objects.Description: An iron bar is here on the ground - it looks quite heavy.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A bar some two by two by ten inches, pure iron.

Objects.Name: bar gold
Objects.Description: A gold bar is here on the ground - it looks quite heavy, but also valuable.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A bar some two by two by ten inches, pure gold.

Objects.Name: bar titanium
Objects.Description: A titanium bar is here on the ground - it looks heavy, but also very valuable.

Objects.Name: gold foil
Objects.Description: Some gold foil is here. You might pick it up - but be gentle with it.
Objects.ExtraDescription: Some very thin sheets of gold foil, ready to use on the armors in thesmithy.  You have to handle them really gently, since they are so thin theybreak if you touch them the wrong way.

Objects.Name: rock
Objects.Description: A piece of rock has fallen down here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A small rock, about the size of your underarm.

Objects.Name: rock large
Objects.Description: A large rock has dropped to the ground here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A large rock, about the size of your head.

Objects.Name: ruby
Objects.Description: Someone have lost a ruby here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A small, bloodred, ruby.

Objects.Name: emerald
Objects.Description: A little emerald is lying here on the ground.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A little green spot of light in a dark world.

Objects.Name: key mine dwarven
Objects.Description: A small key has been tossed to the ground here.

Objects.Name: well basin spring
Objects.Description: Water runs from the spring into a basin, making a nice well for people to drink from.

Objects.Name: bed dwarven small
Objects.Description: A bed, just the right size for a dwarf, has been set in one corner here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: The bed is made from wood, has four corners, and is about 5 feet long.  Youthink it would suit almost any of the dwarves you've met.

Objects.Name: chest dwarven
Objects.Description: A chest, heavily reinforced with iron bands, has been put here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A large chest, with several broad and heavy iron bands going around both thetop and the sides, and a large padlock on the front, stands here.  From thepadlock a blue glitter periodically reoccurs, so you are in no doubt the lock ismagical.

Objects.Name: key dwarven
Objects.Description: A small key has been thrown here.

Objects.Name: parade chain chainmail mail dwarven
Objects.Description: A beautiful dwarven chainmail with a gold hammer emblem has been laid here..
Objects.ExtraDescription: An extremely beautiful chainmail, it encompasses everything you expect from adwarven armor.  It's comparatively light, strong and yet seemingly made onlyfor parades.  On every little ring you can see the 'R' rune, made by Ralf -Armorsmith of the dwarves.

Objects.Name: bed large dwarven
Objects.Description: A large four-poster bed, almost your size, has been set in the corner here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A bed of almost mansize, it's obviously made for the dwarf inhabitant to haveplenty of space.

Objects.Name: key silver
Objects.Description: A small key, made from silver, has been thrown here.

Objects.Name: plate silver dwarven
Objects.Description: A silver breastplate, made for a stout dwarf, has been droppped here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: An extremely nice breastplate it is obviously made for the dwarf of somestature.  You think you might just be able to squeeze in, and you feel verylucky to have found such a beatyful piece of art.  A Rune 'R' has been etchedunder the left armhole.

Objects.Name: axe dwarven two
Objects.Description: A very large axe of dwarven manufacture has been thrown here.

Objects.Name: hammer dwarven
Objects.Description: A hammer, ready for pounding on armor, worn or not, is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A large hammer for dwarven standards, the head of this weapon can also beused in the everyday life of the working dwarf

Objects.Name: pile titanium pieces ore
Objects.Description: A large pile of very fine pieces of titanium ore is attached to a bell here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A very large amount of titanium-rich ore.  A small bell has been attached toit, and you're quite sure you wouldn't be able to get more than a handful ofthem before the bell goes off.

Objects.Name: pile titanium pieces ore
Objects.Description: A large pile of very fine pieces of titanium ore is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A very large amount of titanium-rich ore.  A small bell has fallen to theground in front of it.

Objects.Name: mining pick dwarf
Objects.Description: A small mining pick has been left here, gathering dust.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A mining pick, made for someone not quite as tall as you.

Objects.Name: helm mining dwarven
Objects.Description: An old helmet with an almost extinguished light is here.
Objects.ExtraDescription: A small helmet worn by the dwarves in the mine, so they can see in the totaldarkness downthere.  A small candle sits in a housing on the brim.

Objects.Name: key dwarven city
Objects.Description: A key made from heavy iron is here.
